description: Mohammed Shami is an Indian national team right-arm fast-medium swing and seam bowler. Also known as reverse swing specialist. He became the fastest Indian bowler to take 100 ODI wickets in January 2019.
name: Mohammed Shami | Indian National Cricket Player
